ComicInfo.Summary:
The Thing from Beyond: A strange accident endows a fisherman with inexplicable mental powers that help him predict, then defeat an alien menace.
The Man Who Changed History!: A boastful general believes that he knows how he could have changed the course of history's greatest battles, and a magician gives him the opportunity to prove it by sending him into the past.
The Secret of the Bronze Man: A jungle explorer finds a spring whose water temporarily changes his skin into bronze metal. Returning home, he decides to use this ability to fight crime, but robbers try to steal the secret of his transformation and his doctor warns him that his skin could remain metallic forever.
Happy Hunting Ground: Native American customs regarding death
